item.title: Can Trump trump the 2020 US Presdential Elections?
item.description: Trump’s Approval Margins In the following section of the report we will analyze data on fivethirtyeight.com on all polls that track the president’s approval #Import approval polls data approval_polllist <- read_csv("https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/trump-approval-data/approval_polllist.csv") glimpse(approval_polllist) ## Rows: 15,538 ## Columns: 22 ## $ president <chr> "Donald Trump", "Donald Trump", "Donald Trump",... ## $ subgroup <chr> "All polls", "All polls", "All polls", "All pol... ## $ modeldate <chr> "9/18/2020", "9/18/2020", "9/18/2020", "9/18/20... ## $ startdate <chr> "1/20/2017", "1/20/2017", "1/20/2017", "1/21/20.

item.title: GDP components over time and among countries
item.description: GDP components over time and among countries At the risk of oversimplifying things, the main components of gross domestic product, GDP are personal consumption (C), business investment (I), government spending (G) and net exports (exports - imports). The GDP data we will look at is from the United Nations’ National Accounts Main Aggregates Database, which contains estimates of total GDP and its components for all countries from 1970 to today.

item.title: Climate Change Analysis - Is it really a hoax?
item.description: Climate change and temperature anomalies In the first section of this report we will be studying climate change by looking at temperature anomalies recorded since 1880, specifically the deviations from the expected temperature. The raw data is the Combined Land-Surface Air and Sea-Surface Water Temperature Anomalies in the Northern Hemisphere at NASA’s Goddard Institute for Space Studies. The tabular data of temperature anomalies can be found here. weather <- read_csv("https://data.

item.title: Impact of COVID on Tfl rentals
item.description: Excess rentals in TfL bike sharing Below we analyse the TfL data on how many bikes are hired every single day in London. # Source of our data set url <- "https://data.london.gov.uk/download/number-bicycle-hires/ac29363e-e0cb-47cc-a97a-e216d900a6b0/tfl-daily-cycle-hires.xlsx" In the following graphs we create a facet grid that plots bikes hired by month and year. Looking at May and June in 2020 (after lockdown) we can see that, compared to the previous years, there is a significant increase in the rentals owing to a pent up demand for alternative public transportation to the tube and the bus because of the Covid-19 pandemic.

item.title: My story
item.description: About Vasu Dev Puri I am currently reading for my Masters in Analytics and Management at London Business School and undergoing rigorous training in academic disciplines surrounding Data Analytics, Strategy & Management. My experience, thus far, has provided latitude to appraise businesses through a sector-agnostic approach, coupling the need to identify opportunistic liquid assets using fundamental & thematic analysis. Covid-19, a rather unfortunate sign of our times, offers an unparalleled up scaling potential arising from exposure to market momentum.
